view.name: system, basic, detailed, video, grid, gamecarousel

text.name: TextDescLong
text.text: Golf, unlike most ball games, cannot and does not use a standardized playing area, and coping with the varied terrains encountered on different courses is a key part of the game. Courses typically have 18 or 9 holes, although they may have another number of holes.

text.name: TextDescShort
text.text: Golf is a club-and-ball sport in which players use various clubs to hit balls into a series of holes on a course in as few strokes as possible.
